SEARCH

Class Balls

java.lang.Object
Balls
public class Balls extends Object
Represents a collection of balls with their positions and directions. Allows for the translation of these balls within a defined window.

  • Constructor Details

    • Balls

      public Balls()
      Constructor for Balls class. Initializes empty lists for balls, initial positions, and directions.

  • Method Details

    • translate

      public void translate(int dx, int dy, int windowWidth, int windowHeight)
      Translates the position of each ball in the collection. The translation is bounded by the window dimensions.
      Parameters:
      dx - The change in x-coordinate.
      dy - The change in y-coordinate.
      windowWidth - The width of the bounding window.
      windowHeight - The height of the bounding window.

    • addBall

      public void addBall(int x, int y)
      Adds a new ball with specified initial position.
      Parameters:
      x - The x-coordinate of the ball.
      y - The y-coordinate of the ball.

    • reInit

      public void reInit()
      Reinitializes all balls to their original positions and directions.

    • getBalls

      public List<Point> getBalls()
      Gets the current list of balls.
      Returns:
      A list of points representing the balls' positions.

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Returns a string representation of the balls' positions.
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      A string that lists all the balls' coordinates.
